item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Extend Decline
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories fell for an eighth consecutive week amid declines in imports and domestic production, while product stocks saw further larg...

item.title: Bank of New York Mellon Profit Climbs on Higher Fee Revenue, Lower Costs
item.description: Bank of New York Mellon said quarterly earnings leapt higher as fee and interest revenue climbed and costs came down from a year earlier.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Climb on Inflation Data, Bank Earnings
item.description: U.S. stocks rose, with new inflation data reviving hopes of rate cuts, and solid results from big banks setting a strong tone for this earnings season...
